cp-not-installed: Content Patcher not installed, tokens will not be available.
IllFormatedConfig: Config file seems ill-formated, using default.
SurpressUnnecessaryBoardUpdates.name: Surpress Unnecessary Board Updates
SurpressUnnecessaryBoardUpdates.descript: Prevents the game from trying to reload the special order data before the board is even open.
special_order_pool.description: Lists the current special orders. If order is not available, explains why.
check_tag.description: Checks the current value of one or many tags.
list_available_stats.description: List the stats available. Includes both stats listed as properties in Stats.cs and stats added to Stats.stats_dictionary, including stats added by other mods
special_orders_dialogue.description: Add, delete, or check for whether or not a specific special order dialogue key has been said yet
special_orders_dialogue.usage: Usage: special_orders_dialogue <add/remove/hasseen> <dialogue key> <one or more character names>
special_orders_dialogue.example: ie: special_orders_dialogue hasseen atravita.PamApology_InProgress Penny Pam
special_orders_dialogue.save: Additionally, special_orders_dialogue save will save the current dialogue logs.
month-long-late: Month long quest, not available after the {{cutoff}}th
dialogue.console-error: {{command}} requires at least a desired action, a key, and at least one NPC name.
dialogue.console-add-failure: {{key}}: could not add {{name}}; already in list.
dialogue.no-key: Did not find dialogue key for special order {{baseKey}} for NPC {{Name}}
dialogue.error-in-patched-function: Failed in checking for Special Order dialogue for NPC {{Name}}
stat-not-found: {{key}} not found in `stats.cs`. Is it provided by a mod that's not currently loaded?'
stat-cache-fail: Failure to use {{key}}, please take this log to {{atra}}.
skill-not-found: ${{profession}} for {{skill}} not found; perhaps it's from a mod not installed?
